document.full_text: the two sides have agreed to a preliminary arrangement on demilitarizing the border between them, though some officials from both sides immediately expressed skepticism of the deal.
document.title: north and south sudan tentatively agree to demilitarize disputed border
lines_and_colors: the two sides have agreed to a preliminary arrangement on demilitarizing the border between them, though some officials from both sides immediately expressed skepticism of the deal.
